title: Hey Penne Lyrics Kattappava Kaanom
stanzas:
kadhal nenjil thaen ootrudhey
kaatril mella yaazh meethudhey

kannala nee kadhal pachakuththa
nenjellam panjaagi Â ponadhenna
kaatrodu kaatragum kaatraadipol
kadhal unnoduthaan

hey penne penne
unnai kanda pinney
neram nalla neram
endru thondruthey

oh minnum ponne
kannu kulla undhan
bimbam yengo yennai
kondu poguthey

adikiraa veyila pol
uthuthu pakkura
adikadi kulirapol vandhu
eerkura

kaadhil mella kaadhal solli
kaatril yettri yenna kooti pogura
nooru kaalal nenjam oda
kaatu theeyai yenna paththa vekkura

ma.. mazhaiyai pol
then pozhindhaaye
meen kannaala
oon kalandhaaye

hey penne penne
unnai kanda pinney
neram nalla neram
endru thondruthey

hey penne penne
unnai kanda pinney
neram nalla neram
endru thondruthey

oh minnum ponne
kannu kulla undhan
bimbam yengo yennai
kondu poguthey

adikiraa veyila pol
uthuthu pakkura
adikadi kulirapol vandhu
eerkura
